selected_quotes: 'Scared Straight' awareness programs to decrease juvenile delinquency Cochrane Review: they INcrease delinquency. Heh
'Programs Such as 'Scared Straight' Increase Delinquency Relative to Doing Nothing at All'
@roqchams it actually increasedelinquency relative to doing nothing at all
Programmer som Scared Straight ØKER kriminell atferd hos ungdom med atferdsvansker #brennpunkt
Scared straight programmes seem to have, er, increased crime rates

citation.abstract: 'Scared Straight' and other similar programs involve organized visits to prison by juvenile delinquents or children at risk for criminal behavior. Programs are designed to deter participants from future offending through first hand observation of prison life and interaction with adult inmates. These programs remain in use despite research questioning their effectiveness. This is an update of a 2002 review.
citation.title: 'Scared Straight' and other juvenile awareness programs for preventing juvenile delinquency
